chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>Letter Nine, traditionally attributed to Jerome.<break time="500ms"/>
To Paula and Eustochium on the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary.<break time="2s"/>
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
S. HIERONYMI
EPISTOLA IX. AD PAULAM ET EUSTOCHIUM
De assumptione beatae Mariae Virginis.
